¡Hola, soy Angel Ricardo Gadea!: Hello, I am Angel Ricardo Gadea!
Analista de Middleware Sistemas Operativ: Middleware Analyst for Operating Systems and Databases
Desde que era niño, a los 7 años, recibí: When I was a child, at the age of 7, I received my first computer and fell in love with its infinite possibilities. That moment marked the beginning of my passion for technology. I spent hours exploring every corner of the system, testing its capabilities, and learning how everything worked. As I grew older, my enthusiasm for computing turned into a deep desire to learn programming.
Estudié HTML y CSS en mis primeros proye: I studied HTML and CSS in my early projects, and with each progress I felt immense satisfaction seeing my web pages in action. However, my curiosity led me further: I explored JavaScript, the language that truly ignited my passion for programming. This led me to learn Node.js for backend development and delve deeper into databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB, which allowed me to work with structured and unstructured data, expanding my knowledge in data management.
En 2016, entendí que el desarrollo de so: In 2016, I realized that software development and infrastructure were two worlds I wanted to unite. Thus, I began my journey in DevOps. Since then, I have gained extensive knowledge in cloud platforms like Azure, AWS, and GCP. Mastering these technologies has enabled me to design and implement container-based solutions with Docker and Kubernetes, as well as automate infrastructures with tools like Jenkins, Terraform, and Ansible.
Poseo conocimientos sólidos en scripting: I have solid scripting skills with Bash and PowerShell, as well as experience in managing Nginx and Apache servers, which allows me to manage and optimize environments. My focus has always been on providing comprehensive solutions, combining my programming skills and cloud infrastructure management to deliver efficient and scalable results in every project.

AWS.description: Extensive experience in managing and deploying scalable infrastructures in AWS. I have used services like EC2, S3, RDS, and VPC to create robust solutions.
AWS.relatedProjects: Cloud Infrastructure Project, CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins

Terraform.description: Expert in Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, automating resource provisioning across multiple cloud providers.

Docker.description: Using Docker to create consistent development environments and deploy containerized applications.
Docker.relatedProjects: CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins, Backend Development with Node.js

Jenkins.description: Configuration and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins to automate the continuous integration and deployment process.

Node.js.description: Backend application development using Node.js, creating RESTful APIs and efficient web services.

PostgreSQL.description: Management and design of relational databases with PostgreSQL for high-performance applications.

MongoDB.description: Implementation of NoSQL databases with MongoDB for applications that require flexibility in data management.
